candidate_description: Java developer with over a year of hands-on experience in the IT industry and currently pursuing an M.Sc. in Software Technology. I enjoy building clean and reliable backend systems, with experience ranging from Azure to projects working on Spring boot. Focused on teamwork, automation, and developing software that genuinely improves user experience.

education.degree: Masters of Science In Software Technology
education.additional_info: Key Subjects: DSA, Software Architecture, Middleware Technology, Software Project Management, Software V&V.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science In Information Technology
education.additional_info: Key Subjects: OOP, C++, Python, Java, Linux, AI, Database Systems, .NET, C#, Business Intelligence.

experience.description: Designed a secure full-stack system for encrypted geospatial data using AES, RSA, and Ethereum Smart Contracts. Built a FastAPI backend (Web3.py) and React frontend for secure uploads, permission control, and map visualization. Deployed using Docker, NGINX, and GitHub Actions to enable decentralized access and scalable operations.

Built a MongoDB-based backend integrated with Amazon S3 for efficient data ingestion pipelines. Automated data uploads and visualization using Python scripts and MongoDB Compass. Created CI/CD pipelines and integrated Grafana for real-time analytics on MySQL datasets.

Modernized a legacy mainframe app into a cloud-based accounting platform on Azure. Developed transaction-processing microservices using Spring Boot. Automated revenue distribution processes using Spring Batch, reducing manual effort significantly.
Worked on Azure VNet and Blob Storage setups; conducted server role testing and disaster recovery validation. Identified and optimized CPU resource allocations to improve server performance.
Designed and maintained a business website (Wix, WordPress), boosting company visibility. Handled administrative operations, including billing, quotations, and client correspondence.

projects.name: Personal Finance Tracker
projects.description: Full-stack application for transaction tracking, budget setting, and financial analytics.

projects.name: Q&A Hub (Spring Boot Application)
projects.description: CRUD application for a Q&A platform with Dockerized MySQL backend and automated testing pipelines.

projects.name: GPT Bot for Discord
projects.description: Intelligent Discord chatbot using OpenAI's API for real-time responses.

projects.name: MyPlacement (Recruitment Portal)
projects.description: College recruitment system connecting students and recruiters with admin moderation features.

projects.name: DeBallot – Decentralized Voting System
projects.description: Blockchain-based transparent voting system built on NEAR Protocol.
